options.command (optional): the commandname you need help with

help.description: explains commands and how to use them

options.prefix: The prefix you want to set

setprefix.description: sets a new prefix instread of the current one

options.add: optional, set add=0 to remove authority (default 1)

authorize.description: Allow users with certain roles to use specific commands

options.rank:
The following options are recognized:
unranked, none
smiley, smiley, smile
recruit, nana, nanna, one stripe, 1 nana, 1 nanna, 1 stripe
corporal, two stripe, 2 nana, 2 nanna, 2 stripe
sergeant, three stripe, 3 nana, 3 nanna, 3 stripe
lieutenenant, bronze, bonze star
captain, silver, silver star
general, gold, gold star

setrank.description: sets the rank of a member

options.rank (optional):
The following options are recognized:
unranked, none
smiley, smiley, smile
recruit, nana, nanna, one stripe, 1 nana, 1 nanna, 1 stripe
corporal, two stripe, 2 nana, 2 nanna, 2 stripe
sergeant, three stripe, 3 nana, 3 nanna, 3 stripe
lieutenenant, bronze, bonze star
captain, silver, silver star
general, gold, gold star

setrankdate.description: Sets the date a user was ranked, useful for changing pre-bot ranks

options.runtime: The number of days the poll is running
options.title: The title of the poll
options.channel (optional): channel or channel id to post the poll in, defaults to the channel the command is posted in
options.message (optional): custom message to replace the default poll message (options will still be listed, can't be combined with messageid, channel needs to be specified
options.messageid (optional): id of the message to start a poll on, can't be combined with message, channel needs to be specified
options.emoji#, option#: emoji option pair in the poll. The poll needs at least 2 emoji/options

createpoll.description: creates an emoji poll with hidden results

options.message_id: The message id of the poll message

endpoll.description: ends a poll early and posts the results

options.message_id: the message id of the message the poll is running on

whois.description: Shows some information about the mentioned user
